This workshop is a regularly hosted summer school to teach NGS data analysis, and is taught by Stig Andersen, Mikkel Schierup, and Samuele Soraggi (supporting via the HDS Sandbox). You can find additional information [here](https://international.au.dk/education/admissions/summeruniversity/course/nextgenerationsequencing).
